name: YouTube
description: YouTube is a free video sharing platform owned by Google.

feedFormulas.name: Channel feed
feedFormulas.description: This feed contains the 15 most recently uploaded videos of a channel.

channelId.name: Channel ID
channelId.description: The ID of the YouTube channel. This is different from the channel name or the url of a channel. In order to retrieve the channel ID, you can go to the channel page, press **more links** to view the channel details, then go to **Share channel** and there will be an option **Copy channel ID**. If you own your own channel, you can find the channel ID in the advanced settings of your channel.
